info.name: Book Store API  v1
info.description:
This workspace, "DemoQA API's", is dedicated to exploring, testing, and demonstrating the DemoQA Book Store API. It provides a focused environment for designing and running HTTP requests against the Book Store service, validating responses, and experimenting with typical API testing workflows.

The core element of this workspace is the [Book Store API v1](https://desktop.postman.com/?desktopVersion=11.83.2&userId=19653167&teamId=11538013&region=us#) collection, which organizes the available endpoints for common book-related operations (such as listing books, retrieving details, and managing user-related actions). You can use this collection to:

- Quickly send requests to the Book Store API and inspect responses
    
- Create and maintain automated tests using Postman’s test scripts
    
- Chain requests together in collection runs to model user flows and regression checks
    

This workspace is intended for developers, testers, and learners who want a practical, hands-on environment for working with the DemoQA Book Store API—whether for learning API fundamentals, building test suites, or validating backend changes.

item.name: Account

request.description: Generate the token when provided the correct username and password for DemoQA Book Store Application
Create a new user for DemoQA Book Store Application providing a valid username and password
Verify if user is autheticated and authorized

Delete user account  
Observation: You need to provided the UserID which can be retrieve using the Login API request

Get all the details from user  
Observation: You need to provided the UserID which can be retrieve using the Login API request
Login a user when provided correct username and password
